title: Christmas History - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/24/18
itunes:title: Christmas History - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/24/18
description:
George Noory and Charles Reichblum, aka Dr. Knowledge discuss facts you never knew about Christmas including how Santa Claus got his name, and when the tradition of sending Christmas cards began.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
